SQL.LOAD: SELECT claim_auth_item_id, claim_authorization_id, service_class_id, service_type_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, amount, adjustment_reason_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, po_adjustment_reason_id, adj_line_item_number, 0 as is_deleted FROM elp_claim_auth_item WHERE claim_auth_item_id = :claim_auth_item_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT claim_auth_item_id, claim_authorization_id, service_class_id, service_type_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, amount, adjustment_reason_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, po_adjustment_reason_id, adj_line_item_number, 0 as is_deleted FROM elp_claim_auth_item WHERE claim_authorization_id = :claim_authorization_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_claim_auth_item SET claim_authorization_id = :claim_authorization_id, service_class_id = :service_class_id, service_type_id = :service_type_id, line_item_number = :line_item_number, vendor_sku = :vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description = :vendor_sku_description, amount = :amount, adjustment_reason_id = :adjustment_reason_id, po_adjustment_reason_id = :po_adjustment_reason_id, adj_line_item_number = :adj_line_item_number, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE claim_auth_item_id = :claim_auth_item_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_claim_auth_item ( claim_auth_item_id, claim_authorization_id, service_class_id, service_type_id, line_item_number, vendor_sku, vendor_sku_description, amount, adjustment_reason_id, po_adjustment_reason_id, adj_line_item_number, created_by ) VALUES ( :claim_auth_item_id, :claim_authorization_id, :service_class_id, :service_type_id, :line_item_number, :vendor_sku, :vendor_sku_description, :amount, :adjustment_reason_id, :po_adjustment_reason_id, :adj_line_item_number, :created_by )
